title: Jean-Luc Mélenchon - Wikipedia
snippet: Jean-Luc Antoine Pierre Mélenchon (French: [ʒɑ̃lyk melɑ̃ʃɔ̃] ⓘ; born 19 August 1951) is a French politician who has been the de facto leader of the movement La France Insoumise (LFI) since it was established in 2016. He was the deputy in the National Assembly for the 4th constituency ...

title: Who is Jean-Luc Melenchon, the hard left-leader dubbed 'France's Jeremy Corbyn'? | World News | Sky News
snippet: Jean-Luc Melenchon is the most prominant - and divisive - figure in the left-wing New Popular Front alliance, which came out on top in a shock result in the second round of the French election.

title: French elections: Who is Mélenchon and what does his Nupes alliance want?
snippet: A veteran firebrand of France's far left, Jean-Luc Mélenchon has a strong chance of depriving President Emmanuel Macron of controlling the next government.
